name: Mystic Forest - First Playable Game
description:
Hello and welcome!

FINALLY!!

This is my first playable game ever! I made a 2D platform game for little kids using unity.  I have created and designed nearly everything on my own. The name of my game is "Mystic Forest". 

How to play:

Help the little girl collect the magical crystal in order to open the magical door and head to the next level. Simple!

But beware of the the mystic creatures! Jump on top of their head to make them disappear.

Use A and D keys to walk, and the Space key to jump

Listed below are my creations and ready assets that I used:

  • Designed and created all the game UI.
  • Designed and created each of the player, creatures, in game items (collectables, checkpoint, etc.) using ibisPaint X application.
  • Animated the character and creatures.
  • Designed my only simple tile map using Krita program. (EXCEPT for the animated water tile map which I took from a previous project).
  • Created my own music and sound effects using Groovepad application. 
  • Used some of the previous code assets from previous projects and wrote some of my own code.

Creating this game took a very long time and effort! But it's READY NOW! 

I wanted to add more to the game but unfortunately considering that I didn't have enough time, I had to scratch them T^T. 

BUT!! I will be adding them in the near future in the upcoming updates!

Please enjoy this so simple yet CUTE game!

THANKYOU for your support!!

- Created by: Wassan
